Fun game, the one thing that would make it more fun is no more gen rushing. If more people work on one gen, then you still work on it faster, but the gen time is extended. Gen Rushing makes this game less fun. after Like 10-15 minutes, then fine, Gen rush should occur after that time has passed. It is not fun and yes there is a strategy to slow down gen rush. make all of them red, but there is the chase game, with pallets. Why is the runner out running me? There is so many things about the game that makes me cringe. How about a much more fair game for killers so then both sides have fun. Everytime I am the killer, it seems like 9 out 10 games I am gen rushes, no matter what. This is not fun, fun game. Instead of creating more kiilers, and survivors, how about make it fun for both sides of the party, and how about for a much more scary experience, make the killer 3rd person view and the survivors 1st person, or make both the same, that way it is a fair game play. I stopped playing for the gen rushing. I if there was no gen rush, then this game would be more fun to play. I don't see myself continue to play this game when all I get out of it is gen rushed. How about this, make a lobby where you make it were we can have our own lobby, I don't care about rank, I just want to have fun killing players or a.I.s , it is much funner that way, and I want to choose the difficulty level of the bots. No try hards and no gen rushing. I get irritated very easily with gen rushing,
It's so good although it has some bugs, overall it's good. I recommend you to download this game.++

Dbd es un buen juego, pero los desarrolladores no saben como balancearlo, como un persona que juega los dos lados (Survivor y Killer) puedo decir que survivor es muchooo mÃ¡s facil y muchisimooo menos estresante, por esto mismo opino que deberian hacer que los killers tengan mejores perks o balancear los mapas y eliminar los loops infinitos etc, hay varios cambios sencillos que se podrian hacer si los desarrolladores supieran como los premades de 4 abusan de rusher gens, los loops infinitos de los mapas y las perks rotas como decisive strike etc, esto lamentablemente da como resultado que los killers usen estrategias igual de toxicas como tunelear, campear o usar perks basura como noed, en general es un buen juego y lo recomiendo porque es divertido, pero si quieres jugar en serio debes saber que este juego no estÃ¡ bien balanceado.

ĞšĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°, Ğ² Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞºÑƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞµÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ.

I only recommend against buying this game for now due to some frequent bugs, some of which include poor match making, poor performance from the dedicated servers, and very laggy scenarios. There is also a heavy survivor-capitalist bias. With many players who come in that may play survivor, the developers show a bias towards keeping them engaged for financial benefit then abandon the rest - old survivors, killers, and so forth. 

There's a reason there are many memes about killers getting the short end of the stick, however there are times things are just frustrating for survivors along with killer. Several imbalanced things get bandaid fixes, rather than in-depth reworks. Certain killers, perks and items have gotten more favourable ideas of balance as of late but there are still some glaring issues.

Were the game more consistently good in more areas and the developers showed less 'get rich quick' mentality with a bias, I'd be happier with recommending it. This review may change in the future. It is a fun game, but it is HIGHLY frustrating to the point of being infuriating.
